summary: An urgent email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to Christian Everdell regarding the failure of the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) to retrieve or deliver four items of legal mail to her client Ghislaine Maxwell. Sternheim threatens to file an order to show cause requiring Everdell's presence in court if the status is not confirmed immediately.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell, authoring an urgent email demanding confirmation of the status of Maxwell's legal mail and threatening court action.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Primary recipient of the urgent email from Bobbi Sternheim regarding the legal mail for Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The incarcerated defendant who has not received legal mail in over a week, prompting the urgent correspondence from her attorney.

persons.name: Isabel Maxwell
persons.context: Paralegal at the Law Offices of Leah Saffian, listed in the email footer as a point of contact for the sender's office.

persons.name: Leah Saffian
persons.context: Attorney whose law office is listed in the email footer; the correspondence originates from her firm's address.

connections.description: Sternheim is acting as Maxwell's defense attorney, advocating for her client's access to legal mail while incarcerated.
Sternheim is corresponding with Everdell, likely a legal or corrections official, regarding a procedural issue affecting her client.
Isabel Maxwell is identified as a paralegal at the Law Offices of Leah Saffian.

events.title: Urgent Email Regarding Legal Mail
events.description: Defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim sends an urgent email stating that four items of legal mail for Ghislaine Maxwell are listed as 'Available for Pickup' but have not been retrieved by the MDC, and Maxwell has not received legal mail in over a week.

locations: Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) - implied location of Ghislaine Maxwell's incarceration
225 Broadway, Suite 715, New York, NY 10007 - Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim
11420 Santa Monica Blvd #25424, Los Angeles, CA 90025 - Law Offices of Leah Saffian
BROOKLYN, NY 11232 - Delivery location for the tracked legal mail items
keyFacts: As of October 29, 2021, Ghislaine Maxwell had not received any legal mail for over a week.
Four tracked items of legal mail were listed as 'Available for Pickup' but had not been retrieved by the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).
Defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim threatened to file an order to show cause requiring the recipient's presence in court if the status of the mail was not confirmed immediately.
The correspondence highlights potential issues with prison administration and the defense's access to client communications during Maxwell's incarceration.
The email includes tracking information for four separate mail items destined for Brooklyn, NY 11232.
